Title: String Reorder
Description: Given a string, you want to reorder its characters so that no two adjacent characters are the same. What is the lexicographically minimal such string?
Input Specification: The only input line as a string of length n consisting of characters A–Z.
Output Specification: Print the lexicographically minimal reordered string where no two adjacent characters are the same. If it is not possible to create such a string, print -1.
